SaralTech.title: Google co-founder Larry Page reportedly has a new AI startup
SaralTech.author: Kyle Wiggers
SaralTech.excerpt: Google co-founder Larry Page is said to be building a new company called Dynatomics that's focused on applying AI to product manufacturing.

SaralTech.title: Scale AI is being investigated by the US Department of Labor
SaralTech.author: Charles Rollet
SaralTech.excerpt: Scale AI is being investigated by the U.S. Department of Labor for compliance with the Fair Labor Standards Act.

SaralTech.title: Hugging Face’s chief science officer worries AI is becoming ‘yes-men on servers’
SaralTech.author: Kyle Wiggers
SaralTech.excerpt: Hugging Face co-founder and chief science officer Thomas Wolf thinks that AI today isn't capable of figuring out novel solutions like a human.
